Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: sunnyshannon
Reviews.Content: My daughter received this phone for Christmas and she just loves it. I am thinking about getting my other daughter one for her birthday.

Reviews.Title: Get the update
Reviews.Author: Mark W. "mark"
Reviews.Content: I would agree with the other reviewer until I got the update for the phone. That solved all of the problems with it freezing and restarting. Now, it's a great phone because it's not a smartphone, so you won't be forced into a $30/month data contract. But it runs and feels like a smartphone, so it's really the best of both worlds

Reviews.Title: htc
Reviews.Author: Andrew Kirk
Reviews.Content: Always restarts and is the worst phone I have ever had and my LG view is way better than this
